              You have Opted In to Outbrain tracking. Outbrain will serve you personalized recommendations You have Opted Out of Outbrain tracking. You will no longer receive personalized recommendations
              Effective May 24, 2018
              Download
                ltima atualizao: 23 de maio de 2018
                A Outbrain tem o compromisso de proteger seus dados pessoais. Esta poltica de privacidade (Poltica de Privacidade) rege o uso pela Outbrain dos dados coletados por ns, incluindo todos e quaisquer dados pessoais. Dados pessoais so informaes relacionadas a voc e que podem identific-lo como indivduo. Usamos seus dados pessoais cumprindo todas as leis aplicveis. Para garantir a conformidade e o alinhamento aos valores da Outbrain de confiana e transparncia, temos uma equipe de especialistas responsvel por implementar continuamente o nosso programa global de privacidade.

                + EXPAND ALL
                1. Quem somos, o que fazemos, como contatar a Outbrain, nosso DPO ou as autoridades competentes
                +
                Quem somos:
                Outbrain representa a Outbrain Inc., empresa de Delaware, EUA com sede em Nova York; e suas subsidirias afiliadas (coletivamente denominadas Outbrain ou ns, nos, nosso(as)). Operamos a partir de 12 escritrios globalmente e trabalhamos em parceria com editores de contedo e marketing do mundo todo.
                O que fazemos:
                A misso da Outbrain oferecer recomendaes interessantes aos seus Usurios com base nos seus interesses. Para cumprir nossa misso, firmamos acordos com:
                • Produtores e editores de contedo on-line e parceiros que desejam recomendar contedo relevante aos seus leitores (no Outbrain Engage); e
                • anunciantes que desejam que leitores visualizem seu contedo (no Outbrain Amplify).
                Como nos contatar:
                Fazemos verificaes regulares de conformidade com base nesta Poltica de Privacidade. Perguntas, comentrios e solicitaes relacionados a esta Poltica de Privacidade so bem-vindos e devem ser encaminhados a PrivacyQuestions@outbrain.com ou via correio a Outbrain Inc., 39 West 13th Street, 3rd floor, New York, NY 10011, USA, Attn: Privacy Questions.
                Caso a Outbrain no fornea resposta satisfatria para suas perguntas ou preocupaes, tambm possvel contatar o seguinte departamento para orientaes, suporte ou reclamaes:
                • responsvel externa Data Protection Officer (DPO) da Outbrain: ePrivacy GmbH, representada pelo Prof. Dr. Christoph Bauer. A ePrivacy GmbH pode ser contatada diretamente via privacy@eprivacy.eu; e/ou
                • o rgo pblico britnico Information Commissioners Officer, que o principal servio supervisor da Outbrain nos Territrios Europeus.
                rgos de autorregulao
                A Outbrain segue os Princpios de Autorregulao definidos pela Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA) e pela European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA). Somos membros conceituados da Network Advertising Initiative (NAI), associao dedicada coleta responsvel de dados e ao seu uso para publicidade digital. Seguimos o Code of Conduct for Web and Mobile (Cdigo de Conduta para Web e Internet Mvel) da NAI. A Outbrain tambm segue os Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising (Princpios de Autorregulao para Publicidade Comportamental On-line) e o Europe OBA Framework do Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB).
                2. Tipos de usurios da Outbrain
                +
                Parte desta Poltica de Privacidade est dividida em sees baseadas no seu modo de interagir com a Outbrain portanto necessrio definir em qual tipo de usurio voc se encaixa. Para cada tipo de usurio, explicamos que tipo de informao coletamos e por que, quais cookies e outras tecnologias similares usamos, como compartilhamos essas informaes e quais so os seus direitos.
                Visitantes do Site: Voc um Visitante do Site ao visitar e interagir com nossos websites, pginas na web, recursos interativos, blogs e seus respectivos contedos no Outbrain.com (ou qualquer pgina derivada, como Outbrain.co.uk; Outbrain.fr; Outbrain.de, etc.) e no MyOutbrain.com (Nossos Sites). Veja mais aqui.
                (a) Quais informaes coletamos e por qu
                Queremos entender quais servios nos Nossos Sites interessam a voc e lembr-lo dos servios que oferecemos quando voc no est nos Nossos Sites. Para faz-lo, coletamos as seguintes informaes suas: (i) endereo IP; (ii) dados do Agente do Usurio: tipo de dispositivo (ex.: iPhone), tipo de navegador (ex.: Chrome), sistema operacional (ex.: iOS); (iii) pginas visitadas no Nosso Site (ex.: pgina Sobre ns da Outbrain); (iv) horrio da visita (e respectivo fuso horrio); e (v) URLs de encaminhamento e outras informaes normalmente transmitidas em solicitaes HTTP (ex.: essas informaes nos dizem como voc chegou aos Nossos Sites).
                (b) Quais cookies e outras tecnologias similares utilizamos
                Consulte esta Tabela de Cookies em Visitantes do Site para uma lista detalhada dos cookies (e os respectivos perodos de reteno) que usamos quando voc visita os Nossos Sites.
                (c) Como podemos compartilhar informaes
                • Compartilhamento de informaes que coletamos sobre voc nos Nossos Sites.
                De maneira geral, no compartilhamos dados pessoais seus com terceiros para fins de marketing ou publicidade de terceiros. No entanto, recorremos a vrios terceiros (todos listados nesta Tabela de Cookies) para nos ajudar a vender ou fazer publicidade para voc. Por exemplo: alguns dos cookies que usamos nos Nossos Sites pertencem a terceiros que ajudaro a Outbrain a vender ou fazer publicidade para voc. Exigimos que esses terceiros e empresas se comprometam a manter confidenciais todas as informaes compartilhadas com eles e a usar as informaes somente para cumprir suas obrigaes conosco. Fazemos isso firmando acordos com todos os terceiros que processam dados pessoais em nosso nome para garantir que eles processem seus dados pessoais em conformidade com nossas instrues exatas e com todas as leis de proteo de dados aplicveis. Se voc publicar em nosso blog, seu comentrio e suas informaes ficaro visveis publicamente. Entre em contato com support@outbrain.com para solicitar a remoo do seu comentrio.
                • Usando servios de terceiros nos Nossos Sites.
                Nossos Sites contm links para outros websites que no operamos nem so de nossa propriedade. No controlamos, recomendamos ou endossamos o contedo, os produtos, servios, polticas de privacidade ou prticas desses websites de terceiros. Por exemplo: nos Nossos Sites, voc notar cones clicveis que o levam pgina da Outbrain no Facebook ou no LinkedIn. Ao escolher clicar nesses links, voc deve estar ciente de que Facebook e LinkedIn podem enviar seus prprios cookies ao seu aparelho, que podem coletar dados pessoais de maneira independente. Por isso, importante que voc leia as polticas de privacidade do Facebook e/ou LinkedIn.
                • Consulte tambm a seo de Compartilhamento desta Poltica de Privacidade.
                (d) Seus direitos
                Os Termos de Uso no Nosso Site regem o uso do Nosso Site e tambm se aplicam a voc. Voc pode interromper o uso do Nosso Site a qualquer momento. Ao faz-lo, tambm tem a opo de remover quaisquer cookies que tenhamos colocado em qualquer dispositivo usado para acessar o Nosso Site. Se voc forneceu seu endereo de e-mail durante o uso dos Nossos Sites, todos os e-mails que voc receber da Outbrain incluiro a opo de se descadastrar.
                Para Visitantes no Territrio Europeu, a Outbrain implementou uma plataforma de gesto de consentimento (operada pela One Trust) nos Nossos Sites que d aos visitantes a oportunidade de autorizar ou no cookies e tecnologias similares de rastreamento nos Nossos Sites. Se voc no deu seu consentimento (especificamente em aceitar), a Outbrain no permitir que Nosso Site instale cookies. A base legal da Outbrain para processar dados pessoais em Nossos Sites o consentimento. Voc pode retirar seu consentimento a qualquer momento aqui.
                Usurios: Voc um Usurio ao visitar uma pgina de um website ou aplicativo de um dos parceiros da Outbrain onde o widget da Outbrain esteja instalado (Sites Parceiros). Por exemplo, ao visitar https://news.sky.com/uk, www.bild.de ou www.cnn.com, o widget Outbrain est implementado nesses sites. Ao interagir com um widget da Outbrain, voc informado por um texto que faz referncia Outbrain (ex.: Recomendado pela Outbrain ou by Outbrain ao lado das recomendaes). Ao clicar no link que faz referncia Outbrain, voc ver um aviso detalhado que permite acessar o Perfil de Interesse da Outbrain, que fornece uma visualizao geral dos tipos de categorias de dados da Outbrain que podem ser usados para fazer suas recomendaes. Ele tambm permite optar por recusar recomendaes personalizadas. Veja mais aqui.
                Exemplo de widget da Outbrain
                (a) Quais informaes coletamos e por qu
                Usamos UUIDs, endereo IP e outras Informaes de Uso para poder lhe oferecer recomendaes interessantes. As recomendaes da Outbrain podem ser pagas por um anunciante que redireciona voc para um novo website ou podem ser orgnicas, com link para outra pgina no site do mesmo anunciante.
                • UUID.
                Quando, como usurio, voc visita pela primeira vez um Site Parceiro (ex.: CNN.com), a Outbrain instala um cookie no seu dispositivo para gerar um UUID (identificador nico de usurio). Ns catalogamos e analisamos o contedo que voc consome nos Sites Parceiros. Nossas recomendaes baseiam-se em: (i) histrico de navegao; (ii) padres de navegao similares de outros Usurios; (ii) recomendaes geralmente populares entre o pblico da Outbrain atualmente; (iv) um certo grau de aleatoriedade; e (v) requisitos de pblico-alvo que podem ser fornecidos ou solicitados por nossos clientes Amplify. Por exemplo, a Outbrain pode saber que o UUID 123 (que poderia ser voc no seu iPhone X acessando o jornal Guardian usando o Chrome como navegador) gosta de ler sobre destinos de frias remotos e que pessoas que gostam de ler sobre destinos de frias remotos tambm gostam de ler sobre comida extica.
                O UUID uma sequncia de nmeros e/ou letras. Esse UUID vincula-se ao seu dispositivo e varia conforme o navegador que voc usa. Em outras palavras, a Outbrain registra um UUID diferente dependendo do aparelho e/ou navegador que voc est usando ao acessar os Sites Parceiros. Por exemplo, isso significa que voc ter um UUID quando visitar um Site Parceiro a partir do seu celular usando o navegador Safari e outro UUID ao visitar um Site Parceiro do seu iPad usando o navegador Safari. A Outbrain combinar e consolidar o UUID de um aparelho mvel (celular ou tablet) por um navegador que depois acessa um aplicativo (ou vice-versa) a partir do mesmo dispositivo.
                Atribuir um UUID permite Outbrain associar as visualizaes das pginas visitadas e cliques nas recomendaes da Outbrain desse UUID tudo com o objetivo de fornecer recomendaes interessantes.
                • Endereo IP e outras Informaes de Uso.
                Coletamos um UUID conforme explicado acima e ainda as seguintes informaes: (i) endereo IP (depois anonimizado com base nos padres do setor); (ii) dados do Agente do Usurio: tipo de dispositivo (ex.: iPhone), tipo de navegador (ex.: Chrome), sistema operacional (ex.: iOS); (iii) pginas visitadas; (iv) horrio da visita; e (v) URLs de encaminhamento e outras informaes normalmente transmitidas em solicitaes HTTP.
                As informaes estatsticas acima nos fornecem dados de como muitos Usurios visitaram determinada pgina dos nossos Sites Parceiros que tem o widget da Outbrain instalado, quanto tempo cada Usurio ficou nessa pgina, o tipo de contedo na pgina em que clicou e como foi seu engajamento geral com a pgina em questo. Essas informaes s so dados pessoais quando associadas a um UUID.
                (b) Quais cookies e outras tecnologias similares utilizamos
                Consulte esta Tabela de Cookies em Usurios para uma lista detalhada dos cookies internos que usamos quando voc interage com Sites Parceiros que tenham a tecnologia Outbrain implementada.
                Ao clicar no link para uma das nossas recomendaes, o anunciante Amplify que patrocina a recomendao pode instalar cookies no seu aparelho via redirecionamentos antes da chegada pgina de destino das recomendaes ou ao chegar pgina de destino. Nesses casos, voc estar sujeito poltica de privacidade desse anunciante.
                Alm do widget visvel em Sites Parceiros da Outbrain, determinados anunciantes Outbrain podem implementar o pixel Outbrain nos seus websites. O pixel Outbrain determina se o usurio que acessa a pgina na qual o pixel est instalado possui um UUID Outbrain. Se houver um UUID associado a esse usurio final, a Outbrain permitir que anunciantes redirecionem sua publicidade a esses UUIDs e/ou fornecer aos anunciantes o nmero total de UUIDs que acessaram a pgina em questo. Se no houver UUID Outbrain associado ao usurio que visitou a pgina, o pixel Outbrain no coletar nenhuma informao sobre o usurio. Encorajamos anunciantes a comunicar o uso do pixel Outbrain nos seus prprios websites. A Outbrain no combina informaes do pixel a perfis UUID.
                Pontos de dados como visualizaes de pginas e cliques so vinculados a um UUID particular e mantidos por 13 meses. Por exemplo: se o UUID 123 leu um artigo em 31 de dezembro de 2017, em 1 de fevereiro de 2018 esse artigo deixar de fazer parte do perfil UUID 123.
                (c) Como podemos compartilhar informaes
                A Outbrain no compartilha perfis de Usurio com nenhum terceiro. Contudo, podemos compartilhar o UUID com determinados parceiros para fins de sincronizao de cookies ou com base em requisitos tcnicos. Consulte tambm a seo de Compartilhamento desta Poltica de Privacidade.
                (d) Seus direitos
                • Recusa Outbrain.
                Voc pode optar por recusar as recomendaes personalizadas da Outbrain a qualquer momento. Consulte o Perfil de Interesse da Outbrain para uma visualizao geral dos dados que a Outbrain conhece a seu respeito e pode usar para fazer suas recomendaes. O Perfil de Interesse tambm permite optar por recusar recomendaes personalizadas (voc tambm pode fazer a recusa simplesmente clicando aqui). Note que a recusa nos navegadores feita pelo Perfil de Interesse da Outbrain, mas que a recusa de recomendaes personalizadas em aplicativos feita pelas configuraes do seu dispositivo (veja exemplos de passo a passo no Perfil de Interesse).
                IMPORTANTE mesmo fazendo a recusa Outbrain:
                • Voc ainda ver recomendaes da Outbrain. Recusar o rastreamento para personalizao da Outbrain no significa que voc deixar de receber recomendaes da Outbrain. Em vez disso, significa que as recomendaes da Outbrain no sero personalizadas. As recomendaes ainda usaro informaes sobre o documento que voc est visualizando (ou seja, informaes contextuais) para lhe fornecer recomendaes na pgina em questo.
                • A recusa baseia-se em cookies e especfica para cada dispositivo/navegador. Se voc navegar na internet em diferentes dispositivos e/ou navegadores, voc precisar fazer a recusa em cada aparelho e/ou navegador para que possamos impedir o rastreamento para personalizao em todos eles. Pela mesma razo, se voc comprar um novo dispositivo, mudar de navegador ou excluir (ou limpar) o cookie de recusa, ser necessrio fazer a recusa novamente. Recusar o rastreamento para personalizao no significa bloquear cookies.
                • Para garantir a excluso do perfil vinculado ao seu UUID, no exclua seu cookie de recusa da Outbrain por ao menos 21 dias. Sua recusa s recomendaes personalizadas da Outbrain entra em vigor imediatamente. No entanto, se o seu navegador permite armazenamento local e voc aceitar novamente as recomendaes personalizadas da Outbrain dentro de 21 dias aps sua recusa, possvel que seu perfil anterior seja revinculado ao seu UUID. Se voc no fizer nova aceitao dentro de 21 dias, seu perfil ser excludo e no poder ser recuperado.
                • Como acontece na maioria das recusas, a recusa Outbrain no navegador feita usando um cookie. O cookie de recusa feito para ser mantido, a fim de cumprir as preferncias do usurio. No entanto, o recurso de Preveno de Rastreamento Inteligente do Safari no iOS 11 pode impactar na persistncia dos cookies entre websites aps uma janela de 24 horas. Sugerimos usar outro navegador ou bloquear todos os cookies de terceiros do navegador para que voc faa a recusa sem precisar depender de nenhuma metodologia de recusa de nenhuma empresa.
                • Opes adicionais de recusa.
                Voc tambm pode optar por recusar receber anncios personalizados oferecidos por ns ou outras empresas de publicidade usando ferramentas de entidades do setor, como as pginas da NAI ou as diversas pginas baseadas na DAA (DAA, http://www.aboutads.info/choices; DAAC, www.youradchoices.ca/choices e/ou EDAA www.youronlinechoices.eu). Visitando as pginas da NAI, DAA, DAAC ou EDAA pr-escolha do consumidor permite recusar todos ou alguns dos servios dos membros participantes. Como ocorre na recusa junto Outbrain, essas recusas no significam que voc deixar de receber todos os anncios: eles s deixaro de ser sob medida para voc. Voc pode continuar a receber anncios; por exemplo, com base no website especfico que voc est visualizando (ou seja, anncios baseados no contexto). E se os seus navegadores estiverem configurados para rejeitar cookies quando voc visitar as pginas pr-escolha do consumidor da DAA, DAAC ou EDAA, a recusa tambm pode no funcionar corretamente.
                • Bases legais.
                Os fundamentos legais da Outbrain para processar dados pessoais de Usurios apoiam-se nas bases legais determinadas por cada um dos nossos Sites Parceiros. Cada Site Parceiro baseia-se em consentimento ou interesse legtimo. Consulte a poltica de privacidade aplicvel dos Sites Parceiros para mais informaes sobre as bases legais utilizadas. Se um Parceiro se basear no seu consentimento, a Outbrain no instalar um cookie nos seus aparelhos sem que voc tenha dado seu consentimento no respectivo Site Parceiro.
                Parceiros Comerciais: Voc um Parceiro Comercial ao se cadastrar (ou trocar e-mails com a Outbrain) em nome da empresa para a qual trabalha para utilizar os servios Outbrain Amplify ou Outbrain Engage. Veja mais aqui.
                (a) Quais informaes coletamos e por qu
                Voc pode fornecer determinados dados pessoais (como endereo de e-mail) ao se inscrever para os servios Amplify ou Engage ou se comunicar ou interagir conosco por outros meios. Se voc se inscrever para se tornar Parceiro Comercial, podemos solicitar informaes adicionais suas via formulrios de inscrio para anunciante, pedidos de insero e outros meios. Coletamos informaes automaticamente sobre as aes do seu nome de usurio no painel da Outbrain. Por exemplo, se como Parceiro Comercial Amplify voc alterar o custo por clique de uma de suas campanhas, o registro de auditoria da Outbrain ter o histrico de todas essas aes.
                Coletamos e processamos os dados pessoais acima para cumprir nossas obrigaes nos termos do nosso acordo como Parceiro Comercial (ou potencial Parceiro Comercial) seu, inclusive para:
                responder s suas perguntas e solicitaes;
                fornecer acesso a determinadas funes e recursos dos nossos servios Amplify ou Engage (ex.: para fornecimento e manuteno da sua conta no painel);
                verificar sua identidade;
                nos comunicar com voc sobre sua conta, nossos produtos e promoes disponveis relevantes para o seu uso do servio Amplify ou Engage.
                (b) Quais cookies e outras tecnologias similares utilizamos
                Consulte esta Tabela de Cookies em Parceiros Comerciais para uma lista detalhada dos cookies (e os respectivos perodos de reteno) que usamos com Parceiros Comerciais.
                (c) Como podemos compartilhar informaes
                Podemos revelar determinadas informaes de Parceiros Comerciais a fornecedores, prestadores de servios ou outros que auxiliem a Outbrain na prestao dos seus servios (ex.: processamento de cartes de crdito). Consulte tambm a seo de Compartilhamento desta Poltica de Privacidade.
                (d) Seus direitos
                Se, como Parceiro Comercial, voc deseja verificar, corrigir, atualizar ou solicitar desativao das suas informaes, voc pode acessar o painel da Outbrain para editar suas preferncias de perfil ou nos contatar em support@outbrain.com. Se voc est recebendo e-mails da Outbrain, voc pode se descadastrar acessando o link nos e-mails. Observe que o descadastramento pode no desativar o recebimento de notificaes importantes para o fornecimento dos servios Amplify ou Engage (ex.: faturas por e-mail).
                A base legal da Outbrain para processar dados pessoais dos Parceiros Comerciais o seu interesse legtimo.
                3. Como mantemos a segurana das informaes, transferncias fora do EEE, compartilhamento e perodos de reteno
                +
                Segurana
                A Outbrain possui uma equipe de segurana dedicada. Mantemos rigorosos controles sobre os dados que coletamos, mantendo-os em bancos de dados protegidos com firewall e permisses de acesso estritamente limitadas e controladas, para garantir sua segurana. Verifique nossos padres de segurana para mais informaes.
                Parceiros Comerciais tm acesso a certos recursos protegidos por senha dos servios Amplify ou Engage. Eles so responsveis por manter sua senha confidencial. Lembre-se que, infelizmente, a transmisso de informaes via internet no totalmente segura. Um tipo de fraude comum na internet conhecido como spoofing ou phishing. Ele ocorre quando voc recebe um e-mail de uma fonte que parece legtima solicitando dados pessoais seus. Tenha em mente que no lhe mandaremos nenhum e-mail solicitando a verificao de carto de crdito, informaes bancrias ou quaisquer outros dados pessoais. Se voc vier a receber um e-mail que parea ser nosso solicitando essas informaes suas, no responda e no clique em nenhum link constante no e-mail. Em vez disso, pedimos que nos encaminhe o e-mail para legal@outbrain.com para que possamos investigar possveis casos de fraude pela internet.
                Transferncias de dados fora da UE/do EEE
                Quando transferimos dados pessoais do Espao Econmico Europeu a outros pases nos quais as leis aplicveis no oferecem o mesmo nvel de proteo privacidade dos dados que nos Territrios Europeus, tomamos medidas para fornecer um nvel adequado de proteo privacidade dos dados. Em outras palavras, seus direitos e protees so conservados com seus dados. Por exemplo: usamos clusulas contratuais aprovadas e outras medidas criadas para garantir que os receptores dos seus dados pessoais os protejam.
                Compartilhamento
                Adicionalmente descrio de como podemos revelar seus dados pessoais para cada tipo de usurio, tambm podemos divulgar dados pessoais nos seguintes casos:
                • Dentro do grupo de empresas controladas pela Outbrain, por razes internas, principalmente para fins comerciais e operacionais;
                • Se passarmos por uma transio comercial, como uma fuso, aquisio por outra empresa ou venda total ou parcial dos nossos ativos, seus dados pessoais provavelmente estaro entre os ativos transferidos;
                • Quando legalmente exigido (ex.: para cooperar com investigaes para aplicao da lei ou outros procedimentos legais); e/ou
                • Para reagir a emergncias reais.
                Adicionalmente, combinamos seus dados pessoais aos dos outros usurios para compartilhar informaes sobre tendncias e reunir estatsticas de usurios com terceiros, sempre de forma agregada e anonimizada.
                Reteno de dados
                O perodo de reteno para cada um dos cookies usados pela Outbrain (seja por ela mesma ou em nosso nome por terceiros) est descrito na Tabela de Cookies.
                A Outbrain tambm mantm uma Poltica de Reteno de Dados que detalha o perodo de reteno de dados pessoais com base em nossa anlise do prazo razovel em que necessrio manter cada dado especfico para fins legais ou comerciais. Quando no precisamos mais dos dados pessoais, os exclumos ou destrumos com segurana. Dados agregados, que no so capazes de identificar um dispositivo/navegador (ou indivduo) e so usados para fins de relatrios e anlise, so mantidos enquanto comercialmente necessrios.
                4. Crianas
                +
                Nenhum dos nossos servios destinado a crianas menores de 16 anos. No coletamos deliberadamente dados pessoais de menores de 16 anos de idade. Se durante a coleta constatarmos que um Visitante do Site, Usurio ou Parceiro Comercial menor de 16 anos, no usaremos ou manteremos seus dados pessoais. Se tomarmos cincia de que involuntariamente coletamos dados pessoais de uma criana menor de 16 anos, tomaremos medidas razoveis para excluir tais informaes dos nossos registros. Se voc criana, pedimos que v brincar no quintal em vez de usar ou interagir com a Outbrain!
                5. Cidados do Territrio Europeu
                +
                Em conformidade com as leis de privacidade europeias, especialmente com o Regulamento Geral de Proteo de Dados da Unio Europeia (RGPD), a Outbrain fornece direitos adicionais especficos a cidados dos Territrios Europeus, como o direito de acesso, retificao, contestao, reclamao, excluso e bloqueio. Mais especificamente:
                • o direito de perguntar se ou quais dados pessoais esto sendo processados por ns e o direito de solicitar que os dados pessoais sejam corrigidos ou alterados;
                • em determinadas circunstncias, o direito de solicitar a excluso de dados pessoais;
                • em determinadas circunstncias, o direito de exigir restries no processamento de dados pessoais;
                • o direito de cancelar seu consentimento para processamento e uso dos seus dados, total ou parcialmente e a qualquer momento, com validade para o futuro;
                • o direito de receber seus dados pessoais em formato comum, estruturado e mecanicamente legvel;
                • o direito de contatar nosso responsvel pela proteo dos dados se tiver perguntas, comentrios, reclamaes ou solicitaes relacionadas nossa declarao sobre proteo de dados e o processamento dos seus dados pessoais;
                • o direito de reclamar autoridade supervisora responsvel caso acredite que o processamento dos seus dados pessoais est violando a legislao.
                Alm dos itens acima, relacionamos determinados direitos para cidados do Territrio Europeu ao longo desta Poltica de Privacidade. Nos termos do RGPD, so considerados Territrios Europeus o Espao Econmico Europeu (EEE) e a Sua. Para os fins desta Poltica de Privacidade, o termo Territrios Europeus deve continuar a incluir o Reino Unido mesmo aps sua retirada do Espao Econmico Europeu em decorrncia do Brexit.
                Em caso de perguntas sobre o exerccio de quaisquer dos direitos acima, envie um e-mail a privacyquestions@outbrain.com.
                6. Direitos de privacidade da Califrnia
                +
                Conforme o Cdigo Civil da Califrnia, EUA, nos termos das sees 1798.831798.84, os residentes da Califrnia tm direito de nos solicitar uma notificao que descreva quais categorias de informaes pessoais compartilhamos com terceiros ou afiliados corporativos para os fins de marketing direto desses terceiros ou afiliados corporativos. Essa notificao identificar as categorias de informaes compartilhadas e incluir uma lista dos terceiros e afiliados com os quais foram compartilhadas, junto com os respectivos nomes e endereos. Se voc residente da Califrnia e gostaria de receber uma cpia dessa notificao, envie sua solicitao por escrito a PrivacyQuestions@outbrain.com ou ao seguinte endereo: Outbrain Inc., 39 West 13th Street, 3rd floor, New York, NY 10011, USA. Pedimos que aguarde 30 dias para a resposta.
                7. Comunicazione antitracciamento (Do Not Track)
                +
                Alguns navegadores transmitem sinais Do Not Track (DNT), ou No Rastrear, aos websites. Como no h consenso sobre como interpretar o sinal DNT, a Outbrain atualmente no altera, modifica ou responde a solicitaes ou sinais DNT desses navegadores. Continuaremos a monitorar a atuao do setor nesse mbito e reavaliaremos nossas prticas relacionadas a DNT se necessrio. Enquanto isso, voc pode utilizar as vrias outras ferramentas que fornecemos para controlar a coleta e o uso de dados, incluindo a possibilidade de optar por recusar o recebimento de recomendaes personalizadas na seo Usurios.
                8. Como esta Poltica de Privacidade pode mudar
                +
                De tempos em tempos, podemos fazer alteraes nesta Poltica de Privacidade. Nesse caso, colocaremos um aviso em destaque, visvel para voc como Visitante do Site ou Parceiro Comercial. Contudo, no temos meios para alertar Usurios sobre atualizaes. Recomendamos que voc verifique aqui periodicamente se a Poltica de Privacidade foi atualizada. Sempre exibiremos a data da ltima alterao da Poltica de Privacidade no topo da pgina, para que voc saiba a ltima vez em que foi revisada.
                Effective August 16, 2017  to  May 24, 2018
                Download

                Table of Contents

                  PRIVACY AND COOKIE POLICY
                  If you would like to go directly to Outbrain's opt-out, please click here.
                  Outbrain is a member in good standing of the Network Advertising Initiative (NAI), which is an association dedicated to responsible data collection and its use for digital advertising. Our Service adheres to the NAI Code of Conduct for Web and Mobile.
                  Introduction
                  This privacy and cookie policy (Privacy Policy) applies to information collected through the Outbrain Inc. (Outbrain) family of web sites, web pages, interactive features, applications, widgets, blogs and their respective contents at the following URL: Outbrain.com (the Site) and our platforms: Amplify, Engage, Visual Revenue and Sphere whether accessed via computer, mobile device or other technology (collectively, the Service). The Service is offered by Outbrain Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliated companies (collectively, Outbrain, or we, us, our).
                  Outbrain is committed to protecting your information. This Privacy Policy explains what information we may collect through the Service and the Site, how such information may be used and/or shared with others, how we safeguard it and how you may access and control its use in connection with our marketing communications and activities.
                  When you use the Service or access the Site, we employ cookies and other similar tracking devices to help us collect and store information about you and other users.Please read this Privacy Policy carefully, because by using the Service, and/or accessing the Site, and/or interacting with Outbrains widget via the Service, you are acknowledging that you understand and agree to the terms hereof as well as the Terms of Use set forth on the Site, including the arbitration and class-action waiver provisions.
                  Data Transfers Outside the EU/EEA
                  To the extent any data is provided to Outbrain UK Limited and transferred to Outbrain Inc or to any other recipient outside the EU/EEA, Outbrain ensures the transfer is in full compliance with EU Data Protection Laws by ensuring that an adequate level of protection is given to that data and that adequate safeguards are put in place to protect the data. As an example, Outbrain Inc. has entered into the EU Model Clauses with Outbrain UK Limited and does also adhere to other methods for meeting the adequate protection requirements of Article 25 of the EU Data Protection Directive (95/46/EC), such as standard contract clauses or Binding Corporate Rules.
                  QUICK GUIDE TO CONTENTS
                  1. Information We Collect Automatically
                  2. How We Use The Information We Collect
                  3. Sharing Of Information

                  7. Security Of Your Information

                  12. Contact Us
                  1.  Information We Collect Automatically
                  Whenever you visit or interact with the Service, Outbrain, as well as any third-party vendors and/or service providers, may use a variety of technologies that automatically or passively collect information about how the Service is accessed and used (Usage Information). Usage Information may include, in part, browser type, operating system, device type, an estimate of your geographic location associated with your IP address, the page served, the time, referring URLs and other information normally transmitted in HTTP requests. This statistical data provides us with information about the use of the Service, such as how many visitors visit a specific page on which the Service is installed, how long they stay on that page, the type of content on that page, which hyperlinks, if any, they click on and how they generally engage with that page. This information helps us keep the Service fresh and interesting to our users and tailor content to each visitors interests. Usage Information is generally non-identifying, but to the extent Usage Information may be associated with you as a specific and identifiable person (for example, because you have registered for the Service) and thereby provided Outbrain with personal information such as name, e-mail address, telephone number or home address) Outbrain treats such information as Personal Information (i.e., information that could be used to contact you or to identify you personally) and will only use it for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.
                  We also automatically collect the internet protocol (IP) address or other unique identifier (Device Identifier) for each computer, mobile device, technology or other device (collectively, Device) you use to access the Service. A Device Identifier is a number that is automatically assigned to your Device when you access a web site or its servers, and our computers identify each Device by its Device Identifier.
                  Our Service uses several different technologies to collect Usage Information, including Device Identifiers. These may include, without limitation:
                  Cookies.
                  Cookies are small text files placed on a Device when the Device is used to visit the Service or the Site. We may place cookies or similar files on your Device for security purposes, to facilitate site navigation and to personalize your experience while using the Service, including by better tailoring internal recommendations and promoted content to your preferences over time. For example, we may use your web browsing information to try to show you specific recommendations and sponsored recommendations that we think will be of particular interest to you. You can read more about the cookies we use for the Service by clicking here.
                  We also use cookies in order to keep you logged in to the Service if you register with us. Cookies allow us to collect technical and navigational information, such as browser type, time spent on the Service and pages visited. Cookies may include a Device Identifier along with information about the particular type of content in which you have shown interest. Cookies also allow us to select which content is most likely to appeal to you and display that content while you are using the Service.
                  When interacting with the Service, if you click on a link to one of our promoted content recommendations, the customer sponsoring the promoted link may place a cookie on your Device as well, in which case you will be subject to their privacy policy. Please note that you are subject to the privacy policies of each site you visit if Outbrain is installed on that site, you are subject both to this Privacy Policy and the policy of the web site owner. As further explained in the section of this Privacy Policy entitled OTHER SITES, if you click on an Outbrain link to visit a site where the Service is not installed, you are subject only to that sites privacy policy while visiting that site, and not to this Privacy Policy.
                  You can find more information about the individual cookies most relevant to your use of the Service, and the purposes for which we use them, in our Cookie Glossary here. If you would prefer not to accept cookies, you can do this by activating the setting on your browser that allows you to refuse the setting of all or some cookies. However, if you use your browser settings to block all cookies, please be aware that some functions and features of the Service may not work properly because we may not be able to recognize and associate you with your Outbrain account. In addition, we may not be able to tailor our recommendations as well as we would be able to if you had not blocked the cookies.
                  Log Files.
                  As is true of most web sites, we and our third party tracking-utility partner gather certain information automatically and store it in log files. This information includes IP addresses, browser type, internet service provider, referring/exit pages, operating system, date/time stamp and clickstream data.
                  We use this information, which does not identify individual users, to analyze trends, to administer the site, to track users movements around the site and to gather demographic information about our user base as a whole.
                  Pixel tags.
                  A pixel tag is a transparent graphic image, sometimes called a web beacon or tracking beacon, placed on a web page or in an e-mail, which indicates that a page or e-mail has been viewed. We do link Personal Information provided to us through the Service to Personal Information. In addition, a pixel tag may tell your browser to get content from another server.
                  Information You Provide To Us
                  In addition to the information we collect automatically, we may ask you to provide Personal Information when you sign up for the Service or otherwise communicate or interact with us. We may also ask you to provide other information about yourself, such as name, e-mail address and phone number. If you apply to become a customer of Outbrain, we may request additional information from you via customer application forms, insertion orders and other forms. If you are a customer, we may provide you with the ability to access your account via an Open ID provider, in which case we will ask for your Open ID authentication information. If you do not want your Personal Information collected, please do not submit it. In order to ensure the safekeeping of your information, network advertising companies and publishers are not permitted to directly collect Personal Information through the Service.
                  Our Site includes social media features, such as the Facebook Like button or other similar features such as the share this button or interactive mini-programs that run on our Site. These features may collect your IP address, which page you are visiting on our site, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly. Social media features and widgets are either hosted by a third party or hosted directly on our Site. Your interactions with these features are governed by the privacy policy of the company providing such features.
                  1.  How We Use The Information We Collect
                  Outbrain uses the information we collect about and from you for a variety of business purposes, including for example: to respond to your questions and requests; to provide you with access to certain functions and features of the Service; to provide and maintain your platform account(s); to verify your identity; to communicate with you about your account and activities using the Service and, in our sole discretion for marketing or solicitation purposes, to communicate changes to any Outbrain policy; to tailor content recommendations we serve you; to improve the Service for internal business purposes; to process applications and transactions; and for other lawful purposes we may disclose at the time you provide your Personal Information or to which you otherwise consent.
                  Anytime you post on our blog please be aware that you are posting using a third party application and we have no access or control over this information. To request removal of your personal information from our blog, you can either log into the third party application and remove your comment or you can contact the appropriate third party application. Your interaction with these features is governed by the privacy policy of the company providing it.
                  1.  Sharing Of Information
                  Except as provided in this Privacy Policy, we will not provide any of your Personal Information to any third parties without your specific consent.
                  However, we may disclose Personal Information when legally required to do so, to cooperate with law enforcement investigations or other legal proceedings, to protect against misuse or unauthorized use of the Website, to limit our legal liability and protect our rights or to protect the rights, property or safety of users of this Site, the Service or the public. \We may also disclose your Personal Information to outside individuals and/or companies that help us bring you the products and services we offer and to create, operate, and maintain our Website. For example, we may work with third parties to: (a) to communicate with you by email, postal mail, telephone, text message or other means about our company, our products, or other companys services, products or information that we believe may be of interest to you; (b) manage a database of customer information; (c) assist us with direct marketing, distributing e-mails and data collection; (d) provide data storage and analysis; (e) provide fraud prevention; (f) provide customer service; (g) provide product fulfillment and shipping services; and (h) provide other services designed to assist us in developing and running our Site and maximizing our business potential. We require that these outside companies agree to keep all information shared with them confidential and to use the information only to perform their obligations to us.
                  In addition, if we go through a business transition, such as a merger, acquisition by another company, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your Personal Information will likely be among the assets transferred.
                  Our Site may allow users to post comments and other content to our Site. Any Personal Information that you post to our Website will become public information and will be accessible by other users of the Website. In addition, your user name will be viewable by other users, and we therefore encourage you to use a user name that is not your actual name. We have no responsibility to maintain the privacy or security of any such Personal Information that you may choose to post to our Site.  
                  We may share non-Personal Information, such as aggregate user statistics, demographic information and Usage Information with third parties. We may combine your Usage Information with those of other users of the Service in order to share trend information with third parties, always in aggregated and anonymized form. For example, we may use your Usage Information as part of an aggregated number to tell a prospective sponsor how many people in the Outbrain network visit sports web sites each month.
                  We may also share your information as disclosed at the time you provide your information, as set forth in this Privacy Policy and in the following circumstances:
                  Services On Our Behalf.
                  In order to carry out your requests, to make various features, services and materials available to you through the Service, and to respond to your inquiries, in certain instances we may share your Usage Information or Personal Information with third parties that perform functions on our behalf (or on behalf of our partners), such as companies or individuals like an e-mail service provider to send e-mails on our behalf or a career provider to process employment applications on our behalf and other companies or individuals that host or operate the Service and analyze data or provide customer service including via live chat software. We enter into agreements with all third parties who process Personal Information on our behalf to ensure that they do so in accordance with our instructions and applicable data protection laws.
                  Business Transfers.
                  Your Personal Information may also be used by us or shared with our subsidiaries, affiliates and other entities in the family of companies controlled by Outbrain for internal reasons, primarily for business and operational purposes. As we continue to develop our business, we may sell or purchase a business or assets. If we purchase another entity or if another entity acquires us or all or substantially all of our assets, or assets related to the Service, Personal Information, Usage Information, and any other information that we have collected about the users of the Service may be disclosed to such entity as part of the due diligence process and, if we or our assets are acquired, will be transferred to such entity as one of the transferred assets. Also, if any bankruptcy or reorganization proceeding is brought by or against us, all such information may be considered an asset of ours and as such may be sold or transferred to third parties.
                  Legal Disclosure.
                  Outbrain may transfer and disclose information, including your Personal Information, Usage Information and Device Identifier, to third parties to comply with certain legal obligations when we believe in good faith that the law requires it; at the request of governmental authorities conducting an investigation; to verify, enforce or applicable terms or other applicable policies; to respond to an emergency; or otherwise to protect the rights, property, safety, or security of Outbrain, our customers or others. This may include exchanging information with other companies and organizations for the purposes of fraud protection and credit risk reduction.
                  1.  Advertising/Behavioral Targeting; How To Opt-Out.
                  Outbrain complies with the Digital Advertising Alliances self-regulatory principles and the Network Advertising Initiatives Code of Conduct for Web and Mobile. We encourage you to exercise your right to control and choice regarding Outbrains use of interest-based targeting in the Service and/or advertising on the Site. Please review this section carefully to consider whether you would like to opt out of: personalization of the Outbrain Service, cookies from this Site or both.
                  The Service
                  We may use third party analytics vendors to evaluate and provide us with information about the use of the Service. We do not share Personal Information with these third parties, but they may set and access their own cookies, pixel tags and similar technologies on your Device and they may otherwise collect or have access to information about you, including Usage Information.
                  We may also use third party redirects, which will redirect you through a third party server before redirecting to the final landing page. On this redirect, the third party may place its own cookies, pixel tags and similar technologies on your device (e.g., for purposes of retargeting) and collect or have access to information about you, including Usage Information.
                  We may also use third party vendors who collect information regarding your online activities through their own cookies, web beacons, and other technologies either on our Sites and/or other websites across the Internet, in an effort to understand your interests and deliver you advertisements that are tailored to your interests.
                  Websites
                  If the privacy of your clicks on recommendations or the pages you visit is a concern for you, we urge you to do the following:
                  • Do NOT click on any recommendation you do not want to be associated with.
                  • Opt out of Outbrains personalization tracking by clicking the below Opt-Out button
                  • If you use multiple devices and/or multiple browsers, opt out on each device/browser, and/or if you clear your cookies, to opt out again.
                  You are currently not opted out. Outbrain will serve you personalized recommendation based on your history.You have opted out of tracking, Outbrain will no longer serve you with personalized content recommendations.
                  Opt OutNot Opted Out
                  Applications.
                  To opt-out of the collection and use of data on your mobile application(s), you can adjust your Devices settings. Here are two examples for iOS and Android Devices:
                  iOS Devices: Settings > Privacy > Advertising > Limit Ad Tracking
                  Android Devices: Google Settings App > Ads > Opt Out of Interest-based Advertising
                  Your opt-out process may differ from the examples above, depending on which version of operating system is installed on your Device. Further information on opting out can be found via the NAIs Mobile Choices page: http://www.networkadvertising.org/mobile-choices.
                  Please note, even though you have opted out:
                    • You will still see Outbrain recommendations. Opting out of Outbrain personalization tracking does not mean you will no longer receive internal recommendations and promoted content recommendations from Outbrain. It does mean that the internal recommendations and promoted content recommendations we serve you will not be personalized based on pages you read in the Outbrain network. You will likely receive less benefit from the Service because our recommendations will not be as well tailored to your interests, but we will still use information about the document you are viewing to provide you recommendations on that page.
                    • Outbrain honors requests to opt out of personalization tracking by placing a special Outbrain cookie on your Device that informs our servers not to record information about the pages you are visiting. We place cookies on your Device to prevent personalization tracking. Opting out of personalization tracking is not the same as blocking cookies. As mentioned above, if you browse the web from several Devices, you will need to opt out from each Device to ensure that we prevent personalization tracking on all of them. For the same reason, if you buy a new Device, change browsers or delete this cookie (or clear all cookies), you will need to perform this opt-out task again.
                  You can also opt-out of receiving targeted ads served by us or other advertising companies.
                    • You may use the NAI opt out tool, which will allow you to opt out of seeing targeted ads from us and from other NAI-approved member companies.
                    • Users in the United States, Canada, and Europe may go to the DAA consumer choice page at http://www.aboutads.info/choices, or the DAAC consumer choice page at www.youradchoices.ca/choices, or the EDAA consumer choice page at www.youronlinechoices.eu, for information about opting out of interest-based advertising and their choices regarding having information used by companies listed on the DAA, DAAC, or EDAA, consumer choice pages. Opting out from one or more companies listed on the DAA, DAAC, or EDAA consumer choice page will opt you out from those companies delivery of targeted content or ads to you, but it does not mean you will no longer receive any advertising through our Service or on other websites. You may continue to receive advertisements, for example, based on the particular website that you are viewing (i.e., contextually based ads). Also, if your browsers are configured to reject cookies when you visit the DAA, DAAC or EDAA consumer choice pages, your opt out may not be effective. Additional information is available on the DAAs website at www.aboutads.info, on the DAACs website at www.youradchoices.ca, and on the EDAAs website at www.youronlinechoices.eu.
                    • You may also opt out of receiving targeted ads from other third-party ad networks. You may use the DAA opt out tool, which will allow you to opt out of seeing targeted ads from us and from other companies that adhere with the DAA principles.
                  The Site
                  We use cookies to help us understand how you interact with the Site, including to track conversions (i.e., when an end user registers for the Service) and to collect various usage statistics. Additionally, third parties also place cookies on your Device to engage in interest-based advertising and display advertisements tailored to end users preferences. These third party technologies are not covered by our Privacy Policy; please consult the privacy policy of each third party for details. If you do not wish to have cookies placed on your Device, you have two options: (i) you can block cookies from your web browser or (ii) opt out of interest-based advertising performed by companies that participate in the Digital Advertising Alliance program here.
                  1. Your Privacy Rights, Choice And Access
                  To the extent you have previously registered with us, you may always direct us not to share your Personal Information with third parties, not to use your Personal Information to provide you with information or offers, or not to send you newsletters, e-mails or other communications, by following the removal instructions in the communication that you receive. Please note that we do not send any communications to you unless you have previously indicated to us that you would like to receive such communication. In any event, in each commercial communication we send, we provide an opportunity to opt-out of such communication via an unsubscribe link. Please note that (i) it may take time to process email opt-out requests consistent with applicable law (but no longer than 10 days after receipt of a request) and (ii) you cannot opt-out of transactional or relationship messages sent to registered users of the Service or those who have engaged in transactions with us (e.g., account notifications).
                  If you wish to verify, correct, update or request the deactivation of your information collected through the Site or Service, you may edit your profile preferences or contact us at the above address or e-mail. In accordance with our routine record keeping, we may delete certain records that contain Personal Information you have submitted through the Service. We will respond to requests for access within 30 days. We are under no obligation to store such Personal Information indefinitely and disclaim any liability arising out of, or related to, the destruction of such Personal Information. In addition, you should be aware that it is not always possible to completely remove or delete all of your information from our databases without some residual data because of backups and other reasons.
                  Outbrain will retain your Personal Information for as long as needed to provide services to our customers. Outbrain will retain and use this Personal Information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
                  1.  Children
                  The Service is not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from anyone under 13 years of age. If we determine upon collection that a user is under 13, we will not use or maintain his/her Personal Information without the parent/guardians consent. If we become aware that we have unknowingly collected Personal Information from a child under the age of 13, we will make reasonable efforts to delete such information from our records. If youre a kid, please go play in the yard, dont register for Outbrain!
                  1.  Security Of Your Information
                  We maintain tight controls over all the data we collect, retaining it in firewalled and secured databases with strictly limited and controlled access rights, to ensure it is secure. When you enter sensitive information (such as login credentials) we encrypt that data via SSL encryption. Where we have given you (or where you have chosen) a password that enables you to access certain features of the Service, you are responsible for keeping this password confidential. Please remember that unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure, so although we will do our best to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted via the Service; any transmission is at your own risk. Once we have received your information, we will use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access.
                  A common Internet scam is known as "spoofing" or "phishing." This occurs when you receive an email from what appears to be a legitimate source requesting Personal Information from you. Please be aware that we will not send you any emails requesting you to verify credit card, bank information, or any other Personal Information. If you ever receive an email that appears to be from us requesting such information from you, DO NOT respond to it, and DO NOT click on any links appearing in the email. Instead, please forward the email to us at legal@outbrain.com, as we will investigate instances of possible Internet fraud.
                  How is Service Data Stored and How Long is it Kept?Outbrain uses generally accepted industry security standards to protect data with use of the Service, as further described in Outbrains Security section of our Site located at http://www.outbrain.com/security. We retain identifiable data, which is directly collected for purposes of serving content to end-users, for twenty-four (24) months from the end-users last interaction with our Service, after which time we de-identify the data by removing unique identifiers or aggregating the data. We retain aggregated data, which cannot identify an individual or device and is used for purposes of reporting and analysis, for as long as commercially necessary. We keep opt-out information for longer than this period so that we can continue to honor opt-out requests.
                  1.  Other Sites
                  The Service may contain links to other sites that we do not own or operate. This includes links from customers, sponsors and partners that may use our logo(s) as part of a co-branding agreement. We do not control, recommend or endorse and are not responsible for these sites or their content, products, services or privacy policies or practices. These other web sites may send their own cookies to your Device, they may independently collect data or solicit Personal Information and may or may not have their own published privacy policies. You should also independently assess the authenticity of any site that appears or claims that it is a part of the Service (including those linked to through an e-mail or social networking page).
                  1.  Consent To Processing And Transfer Of Information
                  The Service is operated in the United States. Given that we are an international business, our use of your information necessarily involves the transmission of data on an international basis. If you are located in the European Union, Canada or elsewhere outside of the United States, please be aware that information we collect may be transferred to and processed in the United States. By using the Service, or providing us with any information, you consent to the collection, processing, maintenance and transfer of such information in and to the United States and other applicable territories in which the privacy laws may not be as comprehensive as or equivalent to those in the country where you reside and/or are a citizen.
                  1. Your California Privacy Rights
                  Under California Civil Code sections 1798.83-1798.84, California residents are entitled to ask us for a notice describing what categories of Personal Information we share with third parties or corporate affiliates for those third parties or corporate affiliates' direct marketing purposes. That notice will identify the categories of information shared and will include a list of the third parties and affiliates with which it was shared, along with their names and addresses. If you are a California resident and would like a copy of this notice, please submit a written request to the following address: Outbrain Inc., 39 West 13th Street, 3rd floor, New York, NY 10011. Please allow 30 days for a response.
                  1.  Changes
                  Please note, we may modify information presented via the Service and/or this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make any material changes, we will place a prominent notice on the Site prior to the change becoming effective. You should check back here periodically to see if the Privacy Policy has been updated. We will always show the date of the latest modification of the Privacy Policy at the bottom of the page so you can tell when it was last revised.
                  1.  Contact Us
                  We regularly review our compliance with this Privacy Policy. Questions, comments and requests regarding this Privacy Policy are welcomed and should be addressed to legal@outbrain.com or by mail to Outbrain Inc., 39 West 13th Street, 3rd floor, New York, NY 10011, Attn: Legal Department.
                  Effective August 16, 2017  to  May 24, 2018

                    You have Opted In to Outbrain tracking. Outbrain will serve you personalized recommendations You have Opted Out of Outbrain tracking. You will no longer receive personalized recommendations
                    Effective December 8, 2016  to  August 16, 2017
